preqs: ATS1277 and ATS1278, plus one of ATS2772, ATS2773, ATS2497/ATS3497, ATS2498/ATS3498, ATS2499/ATS3499, COM2407/COM3407, or equivalent

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1277, ATS1278} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2497, ATS2498, ATS2499, ATS2772, ATS2773, ATS3497, ATS3498, ATS3499, COM2407, COM3407})
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {GSC3421, GSC3425, WRT3421}

description: The unit covers a range of compositional techniques used in such written forms as prose fiction, feature articles, reviewing and travel writing. The weekly topics are organised around exercises designed to develop skills in effective use of creative detail, in conscious crafting of formal elements, and in preparation and editing of copy for publication.
